description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. When the rich get poor they get a Bailout!  Collect as much money as possible as it falls from the sky while avoiding suicidal stockbrokers.  Don't forget to kick the homeless before they steal your free government money and use it for medical treatment.  Get a job, hippies!
description.short: When the rich get poor they get a Bailout!  Collect as much money as possible as it falls from the sky while avoiding suicidal stockbrokers.  Don't forget to kick the homeless before they steal your free government money and use it for medical treatment.  Get a job, hippies!
